template.en:
**Objective:** Visualize trends in [dataset_trend] (e.g., [age_group] vs. [cognitive_metric] scores).

**Data Requirements:**
- **Format:** CSV with columns: `[age]`, `[cognitive_metric]`, `[demographic]`
- **Cleaning:** Handle [error_values] (e.g., [outlier] removal via [data_cleanup])

**Python Code:**
```python
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

# Load data
df = pd.read_csv('[dataset1].csv')

# Clean data
df = df[df[[cognitive_metric]] > [threshold]]  # Remove [outlier]

# Plot 1: Trend Line
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
sns.regplot(x='[age]', y='[cognitive_metric]', data=df, 
            line_kws={'color': '[stroke_color]'})
plt.title('[dataset_trend]: [age_group] vs. [cognitive_metric]')
plt.xlabel('[age] (Years)')
plt.ylabel('[cognitive_metric] Score')
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

# Plot 2: Distribution by Demographic
plt.figure(figsize=(12, 6))
sns.boxplot(x='[demographic]', y='[cognitive_metric]', data=df)
plt.title('Distribution of [cognitive_metric] by [demographic]')
plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.show()

# Plot 3: Heatmap Correlation
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
sns.heatmap(df.corr(), annot=True, cmap='[color_palette]')
plt.title('Correlation Matrix')
plt.show()
```

**Insights to Highlight:**
1. **Trend:** [dataset_trend] shows [trend1] (e.g., [cognitive_metric] declines by [value1]% per decade).
2. **Outliers:** [outlier] group (e.g., [age_group] > [value2]) scores [effect1].
3. **Demographics:** [demographic] with [characteristic] scores [effect2] (e.g., [value1]% higher).

**Data Formatting Tips:**
- **Normalization:** Scale [cognitive_metric] to [0-100] via:
  ```python
df[[cognitive_metric]] = (df[[cognitive_metric]] - df[[cognitive_metric]].min()) / \
                         (df[[cognitive_metric]].max() - df[[cognitive_metric]].min()) * 100
  ```
- **Binning:** Group ages into [age_group] bins:
  ```python
df['[age_group]'] = pd.cut(df['[age]'], bins=[0, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100], 
                          labels=['[label1]', '[label2]', '[label3]', '[label4]', '[label5]'])
  ```

**Advanced Visualizations:**
- **Interactive Plotly:**
  ```python
  import plotly.express as px
  fig = px.scatter(df, x='[age]', y='[cognitive_metric]', color='[demographic]', 
                   trendline='ols', title='Interactive [dataset_trend]')
  fig.show()
  ```
- **3D Surface Plot:**
  ```python
  fig = px.density_heatmap(df, x='[age]', y='[demographic]', z='[cognitive_metric]')
  fig.update_layout(title='3D [dataset_trend]')
  fig.show()
  ```

**Tools & Libraries:**
- **Essential:** [library1] (Pandas), [library2] (Matplotlib), [library3] (Seaborn)
- **Advanced:** [tool1] (Plotly), [tool2] (Statsmodels for [trend1] analysis)
template.pl:
**Cel:** Wizualizacja trendów w [dataset_trend] (np. [age_group] vs. wyniki [cognitive_metric]).

**Wymagania dotyczące danych:**
- **Format:** CSV z kolumnami: `[age]`, `[cognitive_metric]`, `[demographic]`
- **Czyszczenie:** Obsługa [error_values] (np. usunięcie [outlier] za pomocą [data_cleanup])

**Kod Python:**
```python
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

# Wczytanie danych
df = pd.read_csv('[dataset1].csv')

# Czyszczenie danych
df = df[df[[cognitive_metric]] > [threshold]]  # Usunięcie [outlier]

# Wykres 1: Linia trendów
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
sns.regplot(x='[age]', y='[cognitive_metric]', data=df, 
            line_kws={'color': '[stroke_color]'})
plt.title('[dataset_trend]: [age_group] vs. [cognitive_metric]')
plt.xlabel('[age] (Lata)')
plt.ylabel('Wynik [cognitive_metric]')
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

# Wykres 2: Rozkład według demografii
plt.figure(figsize=(12, 6))
sns.boxplot(x='[demographic]', y='[cognitive_metric]', data=df)
plt.title('Rozkład [cognitive_metric] według [demographic]')
plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.show()

# Wykres 3: Mapa cieplna korelacji
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
sns.heatmap(df.corr(), annot=True, cmap='[color_palette]')
plt.title('Macierz korelacji')
plt.show()
```

**Wnioski do wyróżnienia:**
1. **Trend:** [dataset_trend] pokazuje [trend1] (np. [cognitive_metric] spada o [value1]% na dekadę).
2. **Odstępstwa:** Grupa [outlier] (np. [age_group] > [value2]) osiąga [effect1].
3. **Demografia:** [demographic] z [characteristic] osiąga [effect2] (np. o [value1]% wyższe).

**Wskazówki dotyczące formatowania danych:**
- **Normalizacja:** Skaluj [cognitive_metric] do [0-100] za pomocą:
  ```python
df[[cognitive_metric]] = (df[[cognitive_metric]] - df[[cognitive_metric]].min()) / \
                         (df[[cognitive_metric]].max() - df[[cognitive_metric]].min()) * 100
  ```
- **Grupowanie:** Podziel wiek na kategorie [age_group]:
  ```python
df['[age_group]'] = pd.cut(df['[age]'], bins=[0, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100], 
                          labels=['[label1]', '[label2]', '[label3]', '[label4]', '[label5]'])
  ```

**Zaawansowane wizualizacje:**
- **Interaktywny Plotly:**
  ```python
  import plotly.express as px
  fig = px.scatter(df, x='[age]', y='[cognitive_metric]', color='[demographic]', 
                   trendline='ols', title='Interaktywne [dataset_trend]')
  fig.show()
  ```
- **Wykres powierzchniowy 3D:**
  ```python
  fig = px.density_heatmap(df, x='[age]', y='[demographic]', z='[cognitive_metric]')
  fig.update_layout(title='3D [dataset_trend]')
  fig.show()
  ```

**Narzędzia i biblioteki:**
- **Podstawowe:** [library1] (Pandas), [library2] (Matplotlib), [library3] (Seaborn)
- **Zaawansowane:** [tool1] (Plotly), [tool2] (Statsmodels do analizy [trend1])

template.en:
**Age Group:** [age_group] (e.g., 5–7, 8–11)
**Language:** [audience_language]
**Theme:** [lesson_topic] (e.g., *[folklore_reference1]* + [unique_sense])

**1. Warm-Up Activity ([warm_up_activity]):**
- **Game:** *[game1_name]*
  - **How to Play:**
    1. [step1] (e.g., *“Say [common_phrase1] when I point to [object]!”*)
    2. [step2] (e.g., *“Now whisper [common_phrase2] to [supporting_character_name]!”*)
  - **Vocabulary:** [A0_word1], [A0_word2], [C1_word1] (for advanced)
  - **Grammar Focus:** [grammar_mistakes] (e.g., *“[simplified_words] vs. [advanced_vocabulary]”*)

**2. Role-Play Scenario ([main_activity]):**
- **Setting:** [scene1_setting] (e.g., a [landscape_type] with [unique_feature1])
- **Characters:**
  - [protagonist_name]: *[character_archetype]* who loves [object]
  - [supporting_character_name]: *[supporting_role]* with a [character_trait1]
- **Dialogue Template:**
  ```
  [protagonist_name]: *“[physical_action]! I need [object] to [hypothetical_scenario]!”*
  [supporting_character_name]: *“But [obstacle]! What if [neutral_event]?”*
  [protagonist_name]: *“Then we’ll [positive_action]!”* (Group repeats [common_phrase1])
  ```
- **Grammar Reinforcement:**
  - **Tense:** [tense_type] (e.g., *“Yesterday, we [past_tense_verb] [object]!”*)
  - **Activity:** [exercise1] (e.g., circle all [grammar_mistakes] in the dialogue)

**3. Grammar Exercise ([activity1]):**
- **Task:** *[exercise1]*
  - **Instructions:**
    - *“Match the [object] to the correct [grammar_mistakes] card!”*
    - *“Use [color_palette] markers to connect [A0_word1] to its [advanced_vocabulary]!”*
  - **Example:**
    | Incorrect          | Correct               |
    |--------------------|-----------------------|
    | *“He [grammar_mistakes]”* | *“He [simplified_words]”* |

**4. Vocabulary Game ([activity2]):**
- **Game:** *[game2_name]* (e.g., *“[unique_sense] Bingo”*)
  - **Setup:**
    - Create bingo cards with [visual_classification] (e.g., [animal1], [animal2], [object])
    - Call out definitions: *“It’s [sensory_details] and you use it to [physical_action]!”*
  - **Winning:** First to shout *“[common_phrase2]!”* wins [reward1] (e.g., sticker of [unique_feature1])

**5. Teacher Communication Strategies:**
- **Positive Reinforcement:**
  - *“[compassionate_phrase]! You remembered [A0_word1]—that’s [affirmation1]!”*
- **Error Correction:**
  - *“Almost! It’s [simplified_words], not [grammar_mistakes]. Let’s try: [common_phrase1]!”*
- **Parent Updates:**
  - **Template:**
    ```
    Hi [parent_name],
    Today, [protagonist_name] mastered [grammar_mistakes] by [positive_action]!
    **Homework:** Practice [exercise2] (e.g., *“Find 5 [object] at home and say [common_phrase1]!”*)
    **Next Class:** We’ll explore [lesson_topic] with [activity1]!
    ```

**Materials Needed:**
- [material1]: [color_palette] flashcards
- [material2]: [object] props (e.g., toy [animal1])
- [material3]: [tool1] (e.g., whiteboard for [visual_classification])
- [material4]: [reward1] (e.g., [unique_feature1] stickers)

**Assessment:**
- **Formative:** [formative_assessment] (e.g., *“Act out [hypothetical_scenario] using [A0_word1]!”*)
- **Summative:** [summative_assessment] (e.g., *“Draw [scene1_setting] and label 5 [object]s!”*)
template.pl:
**Grupa wiekowa:** [age_group] (np. 5–7, 8–11)
**Język:** [audience_language]
**Temat:** [lesson_topic] (np. *[folklore_reference1]* + [unique_sense])

**1. Rozgrzewka ([warm_up_activity]):**
- **Gra:** *[game1_name]*
  - **Jak grać:**
    1. [step1] (np. *„Powiedz [common_phrase1], kiedy wskażę na [object]!”*)
    2. [step2] (np. *„Teraz szepnij [common_phrase2] do [supporting_character_name]!”*)
  - **Słownictwo:** [A0_word1], [A0_word2], [C1_word1] (dla zaawansowanych)
  - **Focus gramatyczny:** [grammar_mistakes] (np. *„[simplified_words] vs. [advanced_vocabulary]”*)

**2. Scenka sytuacyjna ([main_activity]):**
- **Miejsce:** [scene1_setting] (np. [landscape_type] z [unique_feature1])
- **Postacie:**
  - [protagonist_name]: *[character_archetype]*, który uwielbia [object]
  - [supporting_character_name]: *[supporting_role]* z [character_trait1]
- **Szablon dialogu:**
  ```
  [protagonist_name]: *„[physical_action]! Potrzebuję [object], żeby [hypothetical_scenario]!”*
  [supporting_character_name]: *„Ale [obstacle]! A jeśli [neutral_event]?”*
  [protagonist_name]: *„Wtedy [positive_action]!”* (Grupa powtarza [common_phrase1])
  ```
- **Wzmocnienie gramatyki:**
  - **Czas:** [tense_type] (np. *„Wczoraj [past_tense_verb] [object]!”*)
  - **Aktywność:** [exercise1] (np. zakreśl wszystkie [grammar_mistakes] w dialogu)

**3. Ćwiczenie gramatyczne ([activity1]):**
- **Zadanie:** *[exercise1]*
  - **Instrukcje:**
    - *„Dopasuj [object] do poprawnej karty z [grammar_mistakes]!”*
    - *„Użyj markerów [color_palette], aby połączyć [A0_word1] z [advanced_vocabulary]!”*
  - **Przykład:**
    | Niepoprawne       | Poprawne            |
    |-------------------|----------------------|
    | *„On [grammar_mistakes]”* | *„On [simplified_words]”* |

**4. Gra słowna ([activity2]):**
- **Gra:** *[game2_name]* (np. *„[unique_sense] Bingo”*)
  - **Przygotowanie:**
    - Stwórz karty bingo z [visual_classification] (np. [animal1], [animal2], [object])
    - Wykrzykuj definicje: *„To jest [sensory_details], używasz tego do [physical_action]!”*
  - **Wygrana:** Pierwszy, kto krzyknie *„[common_phrase2]!”* wygrywa [reward1] (np. naklejkę [unique_feature1])

**5. Strategie komunikacji z nauczycielami:**
- **Wzmocnienie pozytywne:**
  - *„[compassionate_phrase]! Pamiętałeś [A0_word1] — to [affirmation1]!”*
- **Korekta błędów:**
  - *„Prawie! To [simplified_words], nie [grammar_mistakes]. Spróbujmy: [common_phrase1]!”*
- **Aktualizacje dla rodziców:**
  - **Szablon:**
    ```
    Cześć [parent_name],
    Dziś [protagonist_name] opanował [grammar_mistakes], [positive_action]!
    **Zadanie domowe:** Poćwicz [exercise2] (np. *„Znajdź 5 [object] w domu i powiedz [common_phrase1]!”*)
    **Następna lekcja:** Będziemy eksplorować [lesson_topic] z [activity1]!
    ```

**Materiały potrzebne:**
- [material1]: fiszki w kolorze [color_palette]
- [material2]: rekwizyty [object] (np. zabawka [animal1])
- [material3]: [tool1] (np. tablica do [visual_classification])
- [material4]: [reward1] (np. naklejki [unique_feature1])

**Ocena:**
- **Bieżąca:** [formative_assessment] (np. *„Odegraj [hypothetical_scenario] używając [A0_word1]!”*)
- **Podsumowująca:** [summative_assessment] (np. *„Narysuj [scene1_setting] i podpisz 5 [object]!”*)

- **Protagonist:**
  - **Name:** [protagonist_name]

  - **Arc:** Starts as *[character_archetype]* but learns [learning_agility] by [climax_event].
- **Antagonist/Challenge:**
  - **Name:** [antagonist_name] (or *[specific_event]*)
  - **Traits:** [antagonist_trait1] (e.g., *“represents [sensitive_topics]”*) + [antagonist_trait2] (e.g., *“uses [unconventional_tool]”*)
- **Setting:**
  - **Primary:** [scene1_setting] (e.g., a [landscape_type] with [unique_feature1])
  - **Contrast:** [scene2_setting] (e.g., *[atmosphere]* vs. [time_of_day])

**2. Plot Structure:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Plot" />
| Act       | Key Event                          | Visual Notes                          |
|-----------|------------------------------------|---------------------------------------|
| **1**     | [inciting_incident]                | Panel 1: [visual_description1] (e.g., *[camera_angle]* of [object]) |
| **2**     | [main_conflict]                    | Panel 3: [visual_description2] (e.g., *[color_palette]* for [new_mood]) |
| **3**     | [climax_event]                     | Splash Page: [unique_aspect1] (e.g., *[expression/pose]* with *[lighting_type]*) |
| **4**     | [resolution]                       | Final Panel: [symbol1] (e.g., *[symbol_meaning1]*) |

**3. Script Formatting:**
```
**Page 1**
**Panel 1 (Wide Shot):
*[scene1_setting] at [time_of_day]. [protagonist_name] [physical_action] toward [object].*

**PROTAGONIST:** *“[characteristic_question]? But [obstacle]!”*

**Panel 2 (Close-Up):
*[sensory_details]. [antagonist_name]’s [unique_feature2] glows [color_palette].*

**ANTAGONIST:** *“[provocative_statement].”*

**Panel 3 (Action):
*[new_mood]! [protagonist_name] [positive_action] with [unconventional_tool].*

**SFX:** *[sound1]!*
```

**4. Character Design Tips:**
- **Protagonist:**
  - **Appearance:** [top_outfit] (e.g., *[color_palette]* hoodie) + [accessories] (e.g., *[object]* necklace)
  - **Expressions:**
    - *[expression/pose]* when facing [obstacle]
    - *[new_mood]* after [climax_event]
- **Antagonist:**
  - **Silhouette:** *[unique_aspect2]* (e.g., *[animal1]*-like shadow)
  - **Color Scheme:** [color_palette] (e.g., *[atmosphere]* tones)

**5. Exercises to Aid Writing:**
- **Brainstorming:**
  - *“What if [hypothetical_scenario]? How would [protagonist_name] react?”*
  - *“List 5 [object]s that symbolize [core_message].”*
- **Dialogue Practice:**
  - Rewrite *“[common_pain_point]”* in 3 ways:
    1. [character_archetype]: *“[compassionate_phrase]”*
    2. [antagonist_name]: *“[provocative_statement]”*
    3. [supporting_character_name]: *“[affirmation1]”*
- **Visual Storytelling:**
  - Sketch [scene1_setting] from 2 angles: [camera_angle] + *[unique_sense]*.

**6. Publishing & Sharing:**
- **Formats:**
  - **Digital:** [tool1] (e.g., Clip Studio Paint for [style_reference])
  - **Print:** [tool2] (e.g., [template1_purpose] via Canva)
- **Audience:**
  - **Peers:** Share at [local_network1] (e.g., school *[event_type]*)
  - **Online:** Post on [platform1_strength] with [hashtag1] (e.g., #*[genre]*Comics)

**7. Real-World Examples:**
- **Book:** *[book_title]* by [book_author] (shows [core_message] via [literary_device1])
- **Activity:** *“[practical_application]”* (e.g., create a comic about [personal_story_or_mission])
template.pl:
**Tytuł:** *[book_title]*
**Temat:** [core_message] (np. *„[personal_story_or_mission] poprzez [obstacle]”*)
**Grupa wiekowa:** [age_group] (np. 8–12)

**1. Kluczowe elementy opowiadania:**
- **Protagonista:**
  - **Imię:** [protagonist_name]
  - **Cechy:** [protagonist_trait1] (np. *[character_word1]*) + [protagonist_trait2] (np. *[character_word2]*)
  - **Łuk postaci:** Zaczyna jako *[character_archetype]*, ale uczy się [learning_agility] poprzez [climax_event].
- **Antagonista/Wyzwanie:**
  - **Imię:** [antagonist_name] (lub *[specific_event]*)
  - **Cechy:** [antagonist_trait1] (np. *„reprezentuje [sensitive_topics]”*) + [antagonist_trait2] (np. *„używa [unconventional_tool]”*)
- **Miejsce akcji:**
  - **Główne:** [scene1_setting] (np. [landscape_type] z [unique_feature1])
  - **Kontrast:** [scene2_setting] (np. *[atmosphere]* vs. [time_of_day])

**2. Struktura fabuły:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Fabuła" />
| Akt       | Kluczowe wydarzenie              | Notatki wizualne                      |
|-----------|----------------------------------|---------------------------------------|
| **1**     | [inciting_incident]              | Panel 1: [visual_description1] (np. *[camera_angle] [object]) |
| **2**     | [main_conflict]                  | Panel 3: [visual_description2] (np. *[color_palette] dla [new_mood]) |
| **3**     | [climax_event]                   | Strona rozkładówka: [unique_aspect1] (np. *[expression/pose] z *[lighting_type]*) |
| **4**     | [resolution]                     | Ostatni panel: [symbol1] (np. *„[symbol_meaning1]”*) |

**3. Formatowanie skryptu:**
```
**Strona 1**
**Panel 1 (Szeroki kadr):
*[scene1_setting] o [time_of_day]. [protagonist_name] [physical_action] w kierunku [object].*

**PROTAGONISTA:** *„[characteristic_question]? Ale [obstacle]!”*

**Panel 2 (Zbliżenie):
*[sensory_details]. [unique_feature2] [antagonist_name]’a świeci [color_palette].*

**ANTAGONISTA:** *„[provocative_statement].”*

**Panel 3 (Akcja):
*[new_mood]! [protagonist_name] [positive_action] z [unconventional_tool].*

**EFEKTY DŹWIĘKOWE:** *[sound1]!*
```

**4. Wskazówki dotyczące projektowania postaci:**
- **Protagonista:**
  - **Wygląd:** [top_outfit] (np. bluza w kolorze *[color_palette]*) + [accessories] (np. naszyjnik *[object]*)
  - **Wyrazy twarzy:**
    - *[expression/pose]* podczas [obstacle]
    - *[new_mood]* po [climax_event]
- **Antagonista:**
  - **Siluetka:** *[unique_aspect2]* (np. cień podobny do *[animal1]*)
  - **Paleta barw:** [color_palette] (np. odcień *[atmosphere]*)

**5. Ćwiczenia wspomagające pisanie:**
- **Burza mózgów:**
  - *„Co by było, gdyby [hypothetical_scenario]? Jak zareagowałby [protagonist_name]?”*
  - *„Wymień 5 [object], które symbolizują [core_message].”*
- **Praktyka dialogów:**
  - Przeformułuj *„[common_pain_point]”* na 3 sposoby:
    1. [character_archetype]: *„[compassionate_phrase]”*
    2. [antagonist_name]: *„[provocative_statement]”*
    3. [supporting_character_name]: *„[affirmation1]”*
- **Opowiadanie wizualne:**
  - Naszkicuj [scene1_setting] z 2 perspektyw: [camera_angle] + *[unique_sense]*.

**6. Publikacja i dzielenie się:**
- **Formaty:**
  - **Cyfrowy:** [tool1] (np. Clip Studio Paint dla [style_reference])
  - **Druk:** [tool2] (np. [template1_purpose] przez Canva)
- **Odbiorcy:**
  - **Rówieśnicy:** Udostępnij na [local_network1] (np. szkolne *[event_type]*)
  - **Online:** Opublikuj na [platform1_strength] z [hashtag1] (np. #*[genre]*Comics)

**7. Przykłady z rzeczywistości:**
- **Książka:** *[book_title]* autorstwa [book_author] (pokazuje [core_message] poprzez [literary_device1])
- **Aktywność:** *„[practical_application]”* (np. stwórz komiks o [personal_story_or_mission])

template.en:
**Ebook Title:** *[book_title]: [core_message]*
**Target Audience:** [primary_audience] (e.g., *[gender]* aged [audience_age] seeking [unique_selling_point])

**Table of Contents:**

1. **Introduction: [opening_hook]**
   - *“[provocative_statement].”* — [notable_figure1]
   - **Why This Matters:** [pain_point1] → [transformative_result]
   - **Your Outcome:** By Chapter 12, you’ll [key_achievement1] without [common_barrier].

2. **Part 1: The Psychology of [core_message]**
   - **Chapter 1:** *[chapter1_title]*
     - [key_point1]: [scientific_study1] shows [data_insight1].
     - **Exercise:** *“List 3 times you felt [new_mood]. What triggered it?”*

     - [key_point2]: The [brain_area] releases [chemical] during [specific_situation].
     - **Case Study:** [notable_figure2]’s [personal_story_or_mission]

3. **Part 2: Practical Strategies**
   - **Chapter 3:** *[chapter3_title]* (e.g., *“[action1]: The [adjective] Way to [benefit1]”*)
     - **Step-by-Step:**
       1. [step1] (e.g., *“Mirror [supporting_character_name]’s [physical_action]”*)
       2. [step2] (e.g., *“Ask: ‘[characteristic_question]?’”*)
     - **Script:**
       ```
       You: *“[compassionate_phrase]. I noticed [sensory_details].”*
       Them: *“[response]”*
       You: *“[affirmation1]. Let’s [positive_action].”*
       ```
   - **Chapter 4:** *[chapter4_title]* (e.g., *“[tool1] for [use_case1]”*)
     - **Toolkit:**
       - [tool1]: [tool_purpose1] (e.g., *“Track [metric1] with [app_name]”*)
       - [tool2]: [tool_purpose2] (e.g., *“Use [color_palette] for [visual_classification]”*)

4. **Part 3: Overcoming [common_barrier]**
   - **Chapter 5:** *[chapter5_title]*
     - **Reframing:** *“[myth1]” → “[clarification1]”*
     - **Affirmations:** Repeat *“[affirmation2]”* during [morning_activity1].
   - **Chapter 6:** *[chapter6_title]*
     - **Role-Play:**
       - **Scenario:** *[hypothetical_scenario]* at [location]
       - **Your Line:** *“[assertiveness_tip1]. [provocative_statement].”*

5. **Part 4: Long-Term [key_achievement2]**
   - **Chapter 7:** *[chapter7_title]*
     - **Habit Stacking:**
       - After [daily_activity], do [action2] (e.g., *“Journal [key_point1]”*)
     - **Accountability:** Partner with [accountability_partner1] for [weekly_checkin].
   - **Chapter 8:** *[chapter8_title]*
     - **Milestones:**
       - [milestone1]: [key_achievement1] in [timeframe] days
       - [milestone2]: Host a *[event_type]* to practice [skill1]

6. **Conclusion: [call_to_action]**
   - **Your Next Steps:**
     1. [immediate_action1] (e.g., *“Text [accountability_partner1]: ‘I’ll [action1] by [deadline1]’”*)
     2. [long_term_plan1] (e.g., *“Join [local_network1] for [workshop_topic1]”*)
   - **Final Thought:** *“[one_line_description].”* — [your_name]

**Engagement Boosters:**
- **Interactive Elements:**
  - [quiz1_topic]: *“Which [character_archetype] are you?”* (Link to [online_tool1])
  - [worksheet1]: *“Map Your [core_message] Journey”* (Download via [tool2])
- **Social Proof:**
  - *“[testimonial_content]”* — [Subscriber], [newsletter_name]
  - **Before/After:** [case_study1] (e.g., [protagonist_name]’s [transformative_result])

**Resources:**
- **Books:** [resource1] (*[source1]*), [resource2] (*[source2]*)
- **Podcasts:** [podcast_show_topic] with [podcast_guest]
- **Tools:** [tool3] (e.g., [app_name] for [use_case2])

**Bonus Chapter: [unique_offer]**
- **Exclusive:** [access_code] for [online_tool2] (e.g., *“[dollar_amount] off [course1]”*)
- **Community:** Join [platform1_strength]’s *[community_topic1]* group

description.en: Theologically sound sermon prep with exegetical insights.

template.en:
**Text:** [biblical_phrase] ([book_title] [chapter]:[verse])
**Theme:** [core_message] (e.g., *“[transformative_result] through [specific_situation]”*)
**Audience:** [primary_audience] (e.g., *[age_group]* at [local_network1])

**1. Exegetical Insights:**
- **Original Language:**
  - [original_text] (e.g., Greek *“[A0_word1]”* = *“[C1_word1]”*)
  - **Nuance:** *“[clarification1]”* (e.g., *[literary_device1]* emphasizes [key_point1])
- **Historical Context:**
  - *“[historical_context].”* — [source1] ([year1])
  - **Cultural Note:** [cultural_biases] (e.g., *[custom1]* vs. modern [modern_usage])

**2. Theological Framework:**
- **Reformed Angle:**
  - **Sovereignty:** *“[quote1]”* — [theologian1] (*[source2]*, [year2])
  - **Grace:** Link to [core_message] via [symbol1] (e.g., *[symbol_meaning1]*)
- **Anglican Lens:**
  - **Liturgical Tie:** [traditional_value1] (e.g., *[prayer_book]*’s [common_pain_point])
  - **Sacramental View:** [sensitive_topics] (e.g., *[sacrament]* as [metaphor])

**3. Structure Outline:**
```
**Introduction ([timeframe] min):
- **Hook:** *“Imagine [hypothetical_scenario]. [provocative_statement].”*
- **Text Reading:** [book_title] [chapter]:[verse] (pause at *“[biblical_phrase]”*)
- **Prayer:** *“[compassionate_phrase]...”*

**Body ([timeframe] min):
1. **Point 1:** *[key_point1]*
   - **Illustration:** [personal_anecdote] (e.g., *“Like [specific_event]...”*)
   - **Application:** *“This week, [action1].”*
2. **Point 2:** *[key_point2]*
   - **Contrast:** *“Not [myth1], but [clarification2].”*
   - **Group Activity:** *“Turn to [supporting_character_name] and discuss: ‘[characteristic_question]?’”*

**Conclusion ([timeframe] min):
- **Recap:** *“[core_message]: [one_line_description].”*
- **Challenge:** *“[call_to_action]. Text [accountability_partner1] your [milestone1] by [deadline1].”*
- **Benediction:** *“[affirmation2]...”*
```

**4. Practical Applications:**
- **Personal:**
  - **Journal Prompt:** *“Where have I resisted [transformative_result]? [reflection_question1]”*
  - **Habit:** Pair [morning_activity1] with *“[affirmation1]”*
- **Congregational:**
  - **Small Groups:** Study [resource1] (*[source1]*) on [topic1]
  - **Outreach:** *“Invite [demographic] to [event_type] on [date]”*

**5. Engagement Strategies:**
- **Multimedia:**
  - **Slide Deck:** [visual_element1] (e.g., *[symbol1]* timeline) via [tool1]
  - **Audio Clip:** [sound1] (e.g., *[hymn]*’s [lyric]) during [new_mood]
- **Follow-Up:**
  - **Email:**
    ```
    Subject: [email_subject]
    
    Hi [parent_name],
    
    This week, we explored [core_message]. **Discuss:** *“[characteristic_question]”*
    **Resource:** [link_or_transcript] to [podcast_show_topic]
    **Next Week:** [chapter1_title] ([book_title] [chapter])
    ```
  - **Social Media:** *“[one_line_description]”* + [hashtag1] (e.g., #*[genre]*Faith)

**6. Resources for Further Study:**
- **Books:**
  - [resource1] (*[source1]*) on [topic1]
  - [resource2] (*[source2]*) for [use_case1]
- **Tools:**
  - [tool2]: [tool_purpose2] (e.g., *“Study [original_text] with [app_name]”*)
  - [online_tool1]: *“Join [platform1_strength]’s [community_topic1]”*

**7. Common Pitfalls & Fixes:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Pitfalls" />
| Pitfall                     | Fix                                  |
|-----------------------------|--------------------------------------|
| [common_issue1]              | [mitigation1] (e.g., *“Use [tool3] for [weakness1]”*) |
| [common_issue2]              | [mitigation2] (e.g., *“Clarify [sensitive_topics] with [literary_device1]”*) |

**8. Liturgical Connections:**
- **Prayer:** *“[compassionate_phrase]...”* (from *[prayer_book]*, p. [number])
- **Hymn Suggestion:** *[hymn]* (*“[lyric]”*) for [new_mood]

**3. Szkic struktury:**
```

- **Haczyk:** *„Wyobraź sobie [hypothetical_scenario]. [provocative_statement].”*
```

description.en: Analyze corporate models for tax-efficient fund transfers.
description.pl: Analiza modeli korporacyjnych dla efektywnych podatkowo transferów funduszy.

template.en:
**Objective:** Optimize [funding_amount] transfers between [entity_option1] (e.g., [Host_Company]) and [entity_option2] (e.g., [Parent_Company]) in [geographic_area] while minimizing [tax_implications] and ensuring [compliance_requirement1].

**Current Structure:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Entities" />
| Entity               | Jurisdiction       | Role                          | Current Tax Rate |
|----------------------|--------------------|-------------------------------|------------------|
| [Host_Company]       | [geographic_area]   | [role1] (e.g., [manufacturing_hub]) | [tax_rate1]%     |
| [Parent_Company]     | [geographic_area]   | [role2] (e.g., [holding_company])   | [tax_rate2]%     |
| [Banking_Hub]        | [geographic_area]   | [role3] (e.g., [treasury_operations]) | [tax_rate3]%     |

**Key Data Points:**
- **Annual Transfers:** [funding_amount] (e.g., $[dollar_amount]M for [use_of_funds1])
- **Current Costs:**
  - [tax_implications]: [tax_rate1]% on [transaction_type1]
  - [compliance_fee]: [dollar_amount] for [filing1]

**Analysis:**

1. **Tax Efficiency Opportunities:**
   - **Strategy 1:** *[tax_strategy1]*
     - **Mechanism:** Route funds via [Banking_Hub] using [financial_instrument1] (e.g., [loan_structure])
     - **Savings:** Reduce [tax_implications] from [tax_rate1]% to [tax_rate3]%
     - **Compliance:** Aligns with [compliance_requirement1] (e.g., [OECD_guidelines])
   - **Strategy 2:** *[tax_strategy2]*
     - **Mechanism:** [entity_restructuring] (e.g., convert [Host_Company] to [branch_office])
     - **Savings:** Eliminate [withholding_tax] on [transaction_type2]
     - **Risk:** [high_risk1] (e.g., [audit_trigger]); **Mitigation:** [mitigation1] (e.g., [documentation_requirement])

2. **Legal Compliance:**
   - **Requirement 1:** [compliance_requirement1]
     - **Action:** File [form1] with [regulatory_body1] by [deadline1]
     - **Tool:** [compliance_tool1] (e.g., [software_spec1] for [automated_reporting])
   - **Requirement 2:** [compliance_requirement2]
     - **Action:** Maintain [substance_requirement] (e.g., [local_employees] in [geographic_area])
     - **Cost:** [dollar_amount]/year for [local_office]

3. **Operational Impact:**
   - **Cash Flow:**
     - **Current:** [funding_amount] transferred quarterly with [delay_days] delay
     - **Proposed:** [new_funding_amount] via [payment_method1] (e.g., [real-time_transfer]) with [delay_days] reduction
   - **Reporting:**
     - **Current:** Manual [spreadsheet_name] tracking
     - **Proposed:** [tool4] (e.g., [ERP_system]) for [real-time_monitoring]

**Recommended Structure:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Optimized Structure" />
| Entity               | Jurisdiction       | New Role                     | Tax Rate | Savings          |
|----------------------|--------------------|-------------------------------|----------|------------------|
| [Host_Company]       | [geographic_area]   | [new_role1] (e.g., [R&D_center]) | [new_tax_rate1]% | $[dollar_amount]/year |
| [Intermediate_Entity]| [geographic_area]   | [new_role2] (e.g., [IP_holding]) | [new_tax_rate2]% | $[dollar_amount]/year |
| [Banking_Hub]        | [geographic_area]   | [new_role3] (e.g., [central_treasury]) | [new_tax_rate3]% | $[dollar_amount]/year |

**Implementation Plan:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Timeline" />
| Phase | Action                                  | Timeline       | Responsible Party       |
|-------|-----------------------------------------|----------------|--------------------------|
| 1     | [formation_step1] (e.g., register [Intermediate_Entity]) | [timeframe] weeks | [team_role1] (e.g., [legal_team]) |
| 2     | [compliance_step1] (e.g., submit [form1]) | [timeframe] weeks | [team_role2] (e.g., [tax_advisor]) |
| 3     | [operational_step1] (e.g., migrate to [tool4]) | [timeframe] months | [team_role3] (e.g., [IT_team]) |

**Risk Assessment:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Risks" />
| Risk                          | Likelihood | Impact | Mitigation Strategy                  |
|-------------------------------|------------|--------|---------------------------------------|
| [high_risk1]                  | High       | High   | [mitigation1] (e.g., [audit_defense]) |
| [medium_risk1]                | Medium     | Medium | [mitigation2] (e.g., [contingency_budget]) |

**Cost-Benefit Analysis:**
- **One-Time Costs:**
  - [legal_fees]: $[dollar_amount] for [formation_step1]
  - [IT_costs]: $[dollar_amount] for [tool4] implementation
- **Recurring Savings:**
  - [tax_savings]: $[dollar_amount]/year
  - [operational_efficiency]: [timeframe]% faster transfers
- **ROI:** [return_on_investment]% over [timeframe] years

**Industry-Specific Recommendations:**
- **[industry1] (e.g., [pharmaceutical]):** 
- **Strategy:** Use [Banking_Hub] for [royalty_payments] (taxed at [new_tax_rate3]%)
  - **Example:** [Company1] saved $[dollar_amount] via [financial_instrument2]
- **[industry2] (e.g., [technology]):** 
 - **Strategy:** [IP_migration] to [Intermediate_Entity] (e.g., [patent_box_regime])
  - **Example:** [Company2] reduced [tax_implications] by [tax_rate1]%

**Documentation Requirements:**
1. [legal_document1]: [description1] (e.g., [intercompany_agreement])
2. [legal_document2]: [description2] (e.g., [transfer_pricing_study])

**Next Steps:**
1. **Immediate:**
   - [immediate_action1] (e.g., *“Schedule call with [tax_advisor] by [deadline1]”*)
   - [immediate_action2] (e.g., *“Gather [document1] for [compliance_step1]”*)
2. **Long-Term:**
   - [long_term_plan1] (e.g., *“Monitor [compliance_requirement2] quarterly”*)
   - [long_term_plan2] (e.g., *“Review [tax_strategy1] annually with [team_role1]”*)
template.pl:
**Cel:** Optymalizacja transferów [funding_amount] między [entity_option1] (np. [Host_Company]) a [entity_option2] (np. [Parent_Company]) w [geographic_area], minimalizując [tax_implications] i zapewniając [compliance_requirement1].

**Aktualna struktura:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Podmioty" />
| Podmiot             | Jurysdykcja       | Rola                          | Aktualna stawka podatku |
|--------------------|-------------------|------------------------------|------------------------|
| [Host_Company]     | [geographic_area] | [role1] (np. [manufacturing_hub]) | [tax_rate1]%          |
| [Parent_Company]   | [geographic_area] | [role2] (np. [holding_company])   | [tax_rate2]%          |
| [Banking_Hub]      | [geographic_area] | [role3] (np. [treasury_operations]) | [tax_rate3]%          |

**Kluczowe dane:**
- **Roczne transfery:** [funding_amount] (np. $[dollar_amount]M na [use_of_funds1])
- **Aktualne koszty:**
  - [tax_implications]: [tax_rate1]% od [transaction_type1]
  - [compliance_fee]: [dollar_amount] za [filing1]

**Analiza:**

1. **Możliwości optymalizacji podatkowej:**
   - **Strategia 1:** *[tax_strategy1]*
     - **Mechanizm:** Przekazuj fundusze przez [Banking_Hub] używając [financial_instrument1] (np. [loan_structure])
     - **Oszczędności:** Zmniejszenie [tax_implications] z [tax_rate1]% do [tax_rate3]%
     - **Zgodność:** Zgodne z [compliance_requirement1] (np. [OECD_guidelines])
   - **Strategia 2:** *[tax_strategy2]*
     - **Mechanizm:** [entity_restructuring] (np. przekształcenie [Host_Company] w [branch_office])
     - **Oszczędności:** Wyeliminowanie [withholding_tax] od [transaction_type2]
     - **Ryzyko:** [high_risk1] (np. [audit_trigger]); **Łagodzenie:** [mitigation1] (np. [documentation_requirement])

2. **Zgodność prawna:**
   - **Wymóg 1:** [compliance_requirement1]
     - **Działanie:** Złożyć [form1] do [regulatory_body1] do [deadline1]
     - **Narzędzie:** [compliance_tool1] (np. [software_spec1] do [automated_reporting])
   - **Wymóg 2:** [compliance_requirement2]
     - **Działanie:** Utrzymać [substance_requirement] (np. [local_employees] w [geographic_area])
     - **Koszt:** [dollar_amount]/rok za [local_office]

3. **Wpływ operacyjny:**
   - **Przepływ pieniężny:**
     - **Aktualnie:** [funding_amount] transferowane kwartalnie z opóźnieniem [delay_days]
     - **Propozycja:** [new_funding_amount] przez [payment_method1] (np. [real-time_transfer]) z redukcją opóźnienia o [delay_days]
   - **Raportowanie:**
     - **Aktualnie:** Manualne śledzenie w [spreadsheet_name]
     - **Propozycja:** [tool4] (np. [ERP_system]) dla [real-time_monitoring]

**Zalecana struktura:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Zoptymalizowana struktura" />
| Podmiot               | Jurysdykcja       | Nowa rola                     | Stawka podatku | Oszczędności      |
|-----------------------|-------------------|--------------------------------|---------------|------------------|
| [Host_Company]        | [geographic_area] | [new_role1] (np. [R&D_center]) | [new_tax_rate1]% | $[dollar_amount]/rok |
| [Intermediate_Entity] | [geographic_area] | [new_role2] (np. [IP_holding]) | [new_tax_rate2]% | $[dollar_amount]/rok |
| [Banking_Hub]         | [geographic_area] | [new_role3] (np. [central_treasury]) | [new_tax_rate3]% | $[dollar_amount]/rok |

**Plan wdrożenia:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Harmonogram" />
| Faza | Działanie                                  | Harmonogram    | Odpowiedzialny          |
|------|--------------------------------------------|----------------|--------------------------|
| 1    | [formation_step1] (np. rejestracja [Intermediate_Entity]) | [timeframe] tygodni | [team_role1] (np. [legal_team]) |
| 2    | [compliance_step1] (np. złożenie [form1]) | [timeframe] tygodni | [team_role2] (np. [tax_advisor]) |
| 3    | [operational_step1] (np. migracja do [tool4]) | [timeframe] miesięcy | [team_role3] (np. [IT_team]) |

**Ocena ryzyka:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Ryzyka" />
| Ryzyko                     | Prawdopodobieństwo | Wpływ | Strategia łagodzenia               |
|----------------------------|--------------------|-------|------------------------------------|
| [high_risk1]               | Wysokie            | Wysoki| [mitigation1] (np. [audit_defense]) |
| [medium_risk1]             | Średnie            | Średni| [mitigation2] (np. [contingency_budget]) |

**Analiza kosztów i korzyści:**
- **Koszty jednorazowe:**
  - [legal_fees]: $[dollar_amount] za [formation_step1]
  - [IT_costs]: $[dollar_amount] za wdrożenie [tool4]
- **Oszczędności cykliczne:**
  - [tax_savings]: $[dollar_amount]/rok
  - [operational_efficiency]: [timeframe]% szybsze transfery
- **ROI:** [return_on_investment]% w ciągu [timeframe] lat

**Rekomendacje dla branży:**
- **[industry1] (np. [pharmaceutical]):**
 - **Strategia:** Użyj [Banking_Hub] do [royalty_payments] (opodatkowane [new_tax_rate3]%)
  - **Przykład:** [Company1] zaoszczędziła $[dollar_amount] dzięki [financial_instrument2]
- **[industry2] (np. [technology]):** 
- **Strategia:** [IP_migration] do [Intermediate_Entity] (np. [patent_box_regime])
  - **Przykład:** [Company2] zmniejszyła [tax_implications] o [tax_rate1]%

**Wymagania dokumentacyjne:**
1. [legal_document1]: [description1] (np. [intercompany_agreement])
2. [legal_document2]: [description2] (np. [transfer_pricing_study])

**Następne kroki:**
1. **Natychmiastowe:**
   - [immediate_action1] (np. *„Umów spotkanie z [tax_advisor] do [deadline1]”*)
   - [immediate_action2] (np. *„Zbierz [document1] dla [compliance_step1]”*)
2. **Długoterminowe:**
   - [long_term_plan1] (np. *„Monitoruj [compliance_requirement2] kwartalnie”*)
   - [long_term_plan2] (np. *„Przeglądaj [tax_strategy1] rocznie z [team_role1]”*)

description.en: Interactive study guide for nursing students with randomized terms.
description.pl: Interaktywny przewodnik do nauki dla studentów pielęgniarstwa z losowymi terminami.

template.en:
**Topic:** [lesson_topic] (e.g., *[body_system]* Pathophysiology)
**Level:** [student_level] (e.g., Year [number] [degree_name] students)
**Format:** [format_type] (e.g., randomized [fill_in_the_blank] + [visual_classification])

**1. Key Concepts:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Concepts" />
| Term                     | Definition                                                                 | Example/Application                          |
|--------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|
| [term1]                  | [definition1] (e.g., *“[specific_situation] caused by [pathophysiology1]”*) | *“Patient presents with [symptom1] → [intervention1]”* |
| [term2]                  | [definition2] (e.g., *“[drug_class] that [drug_action]”*)                  | *“Administer [drug_name] for [condition1]”* |

**2. Randomized Flashcards:**
- **Front:** *“Define [term3]”*
  - **Back:**
    ```
    [definition3]
    
    **Mnemonic:** *“[memory_aid1]”* (e.g., *“[A0_word1] [C1_word1] [A0_word2]”*)
    **Clinical Tip:** *“Assess for [complication1] if [finding1]”*
    **Image:** [visual_element1] (e.g., *[diagram]* of [body_system])
    ```
- **Front:** *“What’s the priority action for [scenario1]?”*
  - **Back:**
    ```
    1. [action1] (e.g., *“Administer [drug_name] IV”*)
    2. [action2] (e.g., *“Monitor [vital_sign] q[timeframe] min”*)
    
    **Rationale:** *“[pathophysiology2] → [complication2] risk”*
    ```

**3. Interactive Exercises:**
- **Drag-and-Drop:**
  - *“Match the [term4] to its [definition4]”* (e.g., [drug_class] → [mechanism_of_action])
  - **Options:**
    | [term4]       | [definition4]                          |
    |---------------|----------------------------------------|
    | [drug_name1]  | *“[drug_action1]”*                     |
    | [drug_name2]  | *“[drug_action2]”*                     |
- **Case Study:**
  - **Scenario:** *“[patient_name], [age_group], presents with [symptom2] after [event1]. [vital_sign]s: [value1], [value2], [value3].”*
  - **Questions:**
    1. *“What’s the likely [diagnosis1]? [multiple_choice1]”*
    2. *“What [lab_test1] would you order?”*

**4. Common Mistakes & Tips:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Mistakes" />
| Mistake                          | Correction                                                                 |
|----------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Confusing [term5] and [term6]    | *“[term5] affects [body_part1]; [term6] affects [body_part2]”*           |
| Misinterpreting [finding2]        | *“[finding2] + [symptom3] = [diagnosis2], not [diagnosis3]”*            |

**5. Study Tips:**
- **For [term1]:**
  - *“Use [memory_aid2]: [A0_word1]-[C1_word1]-[A0_word2]”*
  - **Resource:** [resource1] (*[source1]*, p. [number])
- **For [scenario1]:**
  - *“Practice [simulation_tool1] (e.g., [platform1_strength]’s [case_study1])”*

**6. Self-Assessment Quiz:**
1. *“Which [drug_class] is contraindicated in [condition2]?”*
   - A) [drug_name1]
   - B) [drug_name2] ⭐
   - **Explanation:** *“[drug_action2] worsens [pathophysiology3]”*
2. *“What’s the first sign of [complication3] in a patient with [diagnosis1]?”*
   - A) [symptom1]
   - B) [symptom4] ⭐
   - **Explanation:** *“[pathophysiology4] → [symptom4] before [symptom1]”*

**7. Resources for Further Learning:**
- **Videos:**
  - [video_url1]: *“[lesson_topic] Explained”* by [educator1] ([platform1_strength])
  - [video_url2]: *“[procedure1] Demo”* (e.g., [tool1] insertion)
- **Books:**
  - [resource2] (*[source2]*) for [subdomain] (e.g., [body_system] disorders)
- **Tools:**
  - [online_tool1]: [tool_purpose1] (e.g., *“Practice [skill1] with [simulation_tool1]”*)
  - [app_name]: *“Flashcards for [term7]”* (e.g., [Anki_deck])

**8. Peer Teaching Activity:**
- **Instructions:**
  - *“Explain [term8] to [supporting_character_name] (a [student_level] student) in 2 mins using [visual_element2].”*
  - **Rubric:**
    | Criteria               | Points |
    |------------------------|--------|
    | Accuracy               | 5      |
    | Use of [visual_element2] | 3      |
    | [supporting_character_name]’s Understanding | 2      |
template.pl:
**Temat:** [lesson_topic] (np. patofizjologia *[body_system]*)
**Poziom:** [student_level] (np. studenci [number] roku [degree_name])
**Format:** [format_type] (np. losowe [fill_in_the_blank] + [visual_classification])

**1. Kluczowe pojęcia:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Pojęcia" />
| Termin                  | Definicja                                                                 | Przykład/Zastosowanie                      |
|-------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------|
| [term1]                 | [definition1] (np. *„[specific_situation] spowodowane przez [pathophysiology1]”*) | *„Pacjent prezentuje [symptom1] → [intervention1]”* |
| [term2]                 | [definition2] (np. *„[drug_class], który [drug_action]”*)                  | *„Podaj [drug_name] na [condition1]”* |

**2. Losowe fiszki:**
- **Przód:** *„Zdefiniuj [term3]”*
  - **Tył:**
    ```
    [definition3]
    
    **Mnemotechnika:** *„[memory_aid1]”* (np. *„[A0_word1] [C1_word1] [A0_word2]”*)
    **Wskazówka kliniczna:** *„Oceń [complication1], jeśli [finding1]”*
    **Obrazek:** [visual_element1] (np. *[diagram]* [body_system])
    ```
- **Przód:** *„Jakie jest priorytetowe działanie przy [scenario1]?”*
  - **Tył:**
    ```
    1. [action1] (np. *„Podaj [drug_name] IV”*)
    2. [action2] (np. *„Monitoruj [vital_sign] co [timeframe] min”*)
    
    **Uzasadnienie:** *„[pathophysiology2] → ryzyko [complication2]”*
    ```

**3. Interaktywne ćwiczenia:**
- **Przeciągnij i upuść:**
  - *„Dopasuj [term4] do jego [definition4]”* (np. [drug_class] → [mechanism_of_action])
  - **Opcje:**
    | [term4]       | [definition4]                          |
    |---------------|----------------------------------------|
    | [drug_name1]  | *„[drug_action1]”*                     |
    | [drug_name2]  | *„[drug_action2]”*                     |
- **Studium przypadku:**
  - **Scenariusz:** *„[patient_name], [age_group], zgłasza [symptom2] po [event1]. [vital_sign]s: [value1], [value2], [value3].”*
  - **Pytania:**
    1. *„Jakie jest prawdopodobne [diagnosis1]? [multiple_choice1]”*
    2. *„Jakie [lab_test1] zleciłbyś?”*

**4. Częste błędy i wskazówki:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Błędy" />
| Błąd                           | Poprawka                                                                 |
|--------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Mylenie [term5] i [term6]     | *„[term5] dotyczy [body_part1]; [term6] dotyczy [body_part2]”*           |
| Błędna interpretacja [finding2] | *„[finding2] + [symptom3] = [diagnosis2], nie [diagnosis3]”*            |

**5. Wskazówki do nauki:**
- **Dla [term1]:**
  - *„Użyj [memory_aid2]: [A0_word1]-[C1_word1]-[A0_word2]”*
  - **Zasób:** [resource1] (*[source1]*, str. [number])
- **Dla [scenario1]:**
  - *„Poćwicz [simulation_tool1] (np. [case_study1] na [platform1_strength])”*

**6. Quiz samosprawdzający:**
1. *„Która [drug_class] jest przeciwwskazana w [condition2]?”*
   - A) [drug_name1]
   - B) [drug_name2] ⭐
   - **Wyjaśnienie:** *„[drug_action2] pogarsza [pathophysiology3]”*
2. *„Jaki jest pierwszy objaw [complication3] u pacjenta z [diagnosis1]?”*
   - A) [symptom1]
   - B) [symptom4] ⭐
   - **Wyjaśnienie:** *„[pathophysiology4] → [symptom4] przed [symptom1]”*

**7. Zasoby do dalszej nauki:**
- **Filmy:**
  - [video_url1]: *„[lesson_topic] wyjaśnione”* przez [educator1] ([platform1_strength])
  - [video_url2]: *„Demo [procedure1]”* (np. wkłucie [tool1])
- **Książki:**
  - [resource2] (*[source2]*) dla [subdomain] (np. zaburzenia [body_system])
- **Narzędzia:**
  - [online_tool1]: [tool_purpose1] (np. *„Poćwicz [skill1] z [simulation_tool1]”*)
  - [app_name]: *„Fiszki dla [term7]”* (np. [Anki_deck])

**8. Aktywność nauczania rówieśniczego:**
- **Instrukcje:**
  - *„Wyjaśnij [term8] [supporting_character_name] (studentowi [student_level]) w 2 minuty, używając [visual_element2].”*
  - **Kryteria oceny:**
    | Kryterium              | Punkty |
    |------------------------|--------|
    | Dokładność             | 5      |
    | Użycie [visual_element2] | 3      |
    | Zrozumienie [supporting_character_name] | 2      |

description.en: Beginner-friendly flashcards with terms, definitions, and examples.
description.pl: Fiszki przyjazne dla początkujących z terminami, definicjami i przykładami.

template.en:
**Deck Title:** *[deck_name]* (e.g., *[body_system]* Pharmacology)
**Level:** [student_level] (e.g., Year [number] [degree_name])
**Focus:** [subdomain] (e.g., [drug_class] + [pathophysiology1])

**Card Format:**
```markdown
**Front:** [term1]

**Back:**
> **Definition:** [definition1]
> 
> **Example:** *“A patient with [condition1] receives [drug_name]. Monitor for [adverse_effect1] (e.g., [symptom1]).”*
> 
> **Mnemonic:** *“[memory_aid1]”* (e.g., *“[A0_word1] sounds like [C1_word1]”*)
> 
> **Visual:** [visual_element1] (e.g., *[diagram]* of [mechanism_of_action])
> 
> **Clinical Tip:** *“If [finding1], hold [drug_name] and notify MD.”*
> 
> **Common Mistake:** *“Don’t confuse with [term2]—[term1] affects [body_part1], [term2] affects [body_part2].”*
```

**Sample Cards:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Flashcards" />
| Term               | Definition                                                                 | Example                                                                 |
|--------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [term1]            | [definition1] (e.g., *“[drug_class] that [drug_action1]”*)            | *“Post-op [patient_name] gets [drug_name] IV for [condition1].”*     |
| [term2]            | [definition2] (e.g., *“[lab_value1] > [value1] indicates [diagnosis1]”*) | *“[symptom2] + [finding2] → order [lab_test1].”*                     |
| [term3]            | [definition3] (e.g., *“[procedure1] to relieve [complication1]”*)       | *“Use [tool1] for [step1], then [step2].”*                          |

**Deck Categories:**
1. **[drug_class] Drugs**
   - **Cards:** [term1], [term4], [term5]
   - **Tip:** *“Group by [mechanism_of_action]—e.g., [drug_name1] and [drug_name2] both [drug_action1].”*
2. **[body_system] Pathophysiology**
   - **Cards:** [term2], [term6], [term7]
   - **Tip:** *“Link [symptom3] → [diagnosis2] → [intervention1].”*
3. **Procedures**
   - **Cards:** [term3], [term8], [term9]
   - **Tip:** *“Practice [procedure1] steps with [simulation_tool1].”*

**Study Modes:**
- **Randomized:** Shuffle all [number] cards; focus on [weakness1] (e.g., [drug_class])
- **Spaced Repetition:** Use [app_name] (e.g., Anki) with:
  - **New Cards/Day:** [number]
  - **Review Interval:** [timeframe] days for [term1]
- **Peer Quiz:**
  - *“Partner asks: ‘What’s [term4]?’ You explain in <[timeframe] sec using [visual_element2].”*

**Gamification:**
- **Points System:**
  - +1 for correct [definition1]
  - +2 for explaining [mechanism_of_action]
  - +3 for teaching [supporting_character_name]
- **Badges:**
  - *“[drug_class] Master”*: Answer 10/10 [drug_name] cards
  - *“[body_system] Expert”*: Pass [quiz1_topic] with ≥[score]%

**Resources to Pair:**
- **Videos:**
  - [video_url1]: *“[lesson_topic] in [timeframe] mins”* ([platform1_strength])
  - [video_url2]: *“How to [procedure1]”* (e.g., [tool1] insertion)
- **Books:**
  - [resource1] (*[source1]*, Ch. [number]): [subdomain] deep dive
  - [resource2] (*[source2]*): *“[term1] vs. [term2]”* comparison table

**Common Pitfalls:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Pitfalls" />
| Mistake                          | Fix                                                                 |
|----------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Mixing up [term5] and [term6]    | *“[term5] = [drug_action1]; [term6] = [drug_action2]”*            |
| Forgetting [adverse_effect1]     | *“Always check [lab_value1] before [drug_name]!”*                 |

**Teacher’s Notes:**
- **For [term1]:**
  - *“Draw [visual_element1] on board: [mechanism_of_action] path.”*
  - *“Ask: ‘Why not use [term2] for [condition1]?’”*
- **For [term3]:**
  - *“Demo [procedure1] with [tool1]. Let students practice [step1].”*

**Printable Version:**
- **Layout:** [number] cards/page; [color_palette] borders for [drug_class]
- **Back Design:**
  ```
  [term1]
  
  **Definition:** [definition1]
  **Example:** [example1]
  **Image:** [visual_element1] (QR code to [video_url1])
  ```
template.pl:
**Tytuł talii:** *[deck_name]* (np. farmakologia *[body_system]*)
**Poziom:** [student_level] (np. rok [number] [degree_name])
**Focus:** [subdomain] (np. [drug_class] + [pathophysiology1])

**Format karty:**
```markdown
**Przód:** [term1]

**Tył:**
> **Definicja:** [definition1]
> 
> **Przykład:** *„Pacjent z [condition1] otrzymuje [drug_name]. Monitoruj [adverse_effect1] (np. [symptom1]).”*
> 
> **Mnemotechnika:** *„[memory_aid1]”* (np. *„[A0_word1] brzmi jak [C1_word1]”*)
> 
> **Wizualizacja:** [visual_element1] (np. *[diagram]* [mechanism_of_action])
> 
> **Wskazówka kliniczna:** *„Jeśli [finding1], wstrzymaj [drug_name] i powiadom lekarza.”*
> 
> **Częsty błąd:** *„Nie myl z [term2]—[term1] działa na [body_part1], [term2] na [body_part2].”*
```

**Przykładowe karty:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Fiszki" />
| Termin             | Definicja                                                                 | Przykład                                                                 |
|--------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [term1]            | [definition1] (np. *„[drug_class], który [drug_action1]”*)            | *„Pooperacyjny [patient_name] dostaje [drug_name] IV na [condition1].”*     |
| [term2]            | [definition2] (np. *„[lab_value1] > [value1] wskazuje na [diagnosis1]”*) | *„[symptom2] + [finding2] → zleć [lab_test1].”*                     |
| [term3]            | [definition3] (np. *„[procedure1] w celu złagodzenia [complication1]”*)       | *„Użyj [tool1] do [step1], potem [step2].”*                          |

**Kategorie talii:**
1. **Leki [drug_class]**
   - **Karty:** [term1], [term4], [term5]
   - **Wskazówka:** *„Grupuj według [mechanism_of_action]—np. [drug_name1] i [drug_name2] oba [drug_action1].”*
2. **Patofizjologia [body_system]**
   - **Karty:** [term2], [term6], [term7]
   - **Wskazówka:** *„Powiązanie: [symptom3] → [diagnosis2] → [intervention1].”*
3. **Procedury**
   - **Karty:** [term3], [term8], [term9]
   - **Wskazówka:** *„Poćwicz kroki [procedure1] z [simulation_tool1].”*

**Tryby nauki:**
- **Losowe:** Tasuj wszystkie [number] karty; skup się na [weakness1] (np. [drug_class])
- **Powtórki rozłożone:**
  - Użyj [app_name] (np. Anki) z:
    - **Nowe karty/dzień:** [number]
    - **Interwał powtórek:** [timeframe] dni dla [term1]
- **Quiz z rówieśnikami:**
  - *„Partner pyta: ‘Co to [term4]?’ Ty wyjaśnias w <[timeframe] sek używając [visual_element2].”*

**Gamifikacja:**
- **System punktów:**
  - +1 za poprawną [definition1]
  - +2 za wyjaśnienie [mechanism_of_action]
  - +3 za nauczanie [supporting_character_name]
- **Odznaki:**
  - *„Mistrz [drug_class]”: Odpowiedz poprawnie na 10/10 kart [drug_name]
  - *„Ekspert [body_system]”: Zdaj [quiz1_topic] z ≥[score]%

**Zasoby do parowania:**
- **Filmy:**
  - [video_url1]: *„[lesson_topic] w [timeframe] min”* ([platform1_strength])
  - [video_url2]: *„Jak [procedure1]”* (np. wkłucie [tool1])
- **Książki:**
  - [resource1] (*[source1]*, rozdz. [number]): dogłębne [subdomain]
  - [resource2] (*[source2]*): tabela porównawcza *„[term1] vs. [term2]”*

**Częste pułapki:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Pułapki" />
| Błąd                           | Poprawka                                                                 |
|---------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Mylenie [term5] i [term6]      | *„[term5] = [drug_action1]; [term6] = [drug_action2]”*                |
| Zapominanie o [adverse_effect1] | *„Zawsze sprawdź [lab_value1] przed [drug_name]!”*                     |

**Notatki dla nauczyciela:**
- **Dla [term1]:**
  - *„Narysuj [visual_element1] na tablicy: ścieżka [mechanism_of_action].”*
  - *„Zapytaj: ‘Dlaczego nie użyć [term2] na [condition1]?’”*
- **Dla [term3]:**
  - *„Zademonstruj [procedure1] z [tool1]. Pozwól uczniom poćwiczyć [step1].”*

**Wersja do druku:**
- **Układ:** [number] kart/strona; obramowania [color_palette] dla [drug_class]
- **Projekt tyłu:**
  ```
  [term1]
  
  **Definicja:** [definition1]
  **Przykład:** [example1]
  **Obrazek:** [visual_element1] (kod QR do [video_url1])
  ```

description.en: Comprehensive, structured notes for nursing students.
description.pl: Kompleksowe, ustrukturyzowane notatki dla studentów pielęgniarstwa.

template.en:
**Topic:** [lesson_topic] (e.g., *[body_system]* Disorders)
**Course:** [degree_name] [number] (e.g., BSN Year 2)
**Focus:** [subdomain] (e.g., [drug_class] + [pathophysiology1])

**1. Key Concepts Overview:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Concepts" />
| Concept               | Definition                                                                 | Clinical Relevance                                      |
|-----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------|
| [term1]               | [definition1] (e.g., *“[drug_class] that [drug_action1]”*)               | *“Used for [condition1]; monitor for [adverse_effect1]”* |
| [term2]               | [definition2] (e.g., *“[pathophysiology1] → [symptom1]”*)                  | *“Assess [vital_sign] q[timeframe]h for [complication1]”* |

**2. Pathophysiology Deep Dive:**
- **[condition1]:**
  - **Mechanism:**
    1. [step1] (e.g., *“[cell_type1] releases [chemical1]”*)
    2. [step2] → *“[organ1] responds with [response1]”*
  - **Manifestations:**
    - **Early:** [symptom1], [symptom2]
    - **Late:** [symptom3] (e.g., *“[finding1] on [diagnostic_tool1]”*)
  - **Complications:** [complication1] (e.g., *“[pathophysiology2] → [organ_failure1]”*)

**3. Pharmacology:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Drugs" />
| Drug               | Class               | Mechanism of Action                          | Nursing Considerations                          |
|--------------------|----------------------|-----------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| [drug_name1]       | [drug_class]         | *“[drug_action1]”*                           | *“Monitor: [lab_value1], [vital_sign].
   **SEs:** [adverse_effect1], [adverse_effect2]
   **Teach:** ‘Report [symptom4] immediately.’”* |
| [drug_name2]       | [drug_class]         | *“[drug_action2]”*                           | *“Contraindicated in [condition2].
   **Antidote:** [antidote1] for overdose.”* |

**4. Procedures & Skills:**
- **[procedure1]:**
  - **Steps:**
    1. [step1] (e.g., *“Gather: [tool1], [tool2], [PPE]”*)
    2. [step2] → *“[action1] while explaining [patient_education1]”*
  - **Complications:**
    - [complication2]: *“Caused by [error1]; prevent with [prevention1]”*
    - [complication3]: *“Signs: [symptom5], [symptom6]”*

**5. Common Mistakes & Clarifications:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Mistakes" />
| Mistake                          | Correction                                                                 |
|----------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Confusing [term3] and [term4]    | *“[term3] = [definition3]; [term4] = [definition4]”*                     |
| Misinterpreting [lab_value2]     | *“[value1]–[value2] = normal; >[value3] = [diagnosis2]”*                  |

**6. Case Study Practice:**
- **Scenario:**
  *“[patient_name], [age_group], presents with [symptom1] and [symptom2]. PMH: [condition1], [allergy1]. [vital_sign]s: [value1]/[value2], [value3] bpm, [value4]°C.”*
- **Questions:**
  1. *“What’s the priority [assessment1]?”* → **[answer1]** (e.g., *“Check [lab_value1] for [abnormality1]”*)
  2. *“Which [drug_name1] or [drug_name2] would you administer?”* → **[answer2]** (e.g., *“[drug_name1]—[drug_action1] counters [pathophysiology1]”*)

**7. Visual Aids:**
- **[visual_element1]:** *[diagram]* of [mechanism_of_action] for [drug_name1]
  - **Label:** [body_part1], [body_part2], [chemical1]
- **[visual_element2]:** Flowchart of [condition1] progression:
  ```
  [symptom1] → [finding1] → [diagnosis1] → [intervention1] → [outcome1]
  ```

**8. Memory Tricks:**
- **For [term1]:** *“[memory_aid1]”* (e.g., *“[A0_word1] sounds like [C1_word1]”*)
- **For [drug_class]:**
  ```
  *“[drug_name1] and [drug_name2] both end with ‘-[suffix1]’ 
  → They [drug_action1]!”*
  ```

**9. Resources for Further Study:**
- **Videos:**
  - [video_url1]: *“[lesson_topic] in [timeframe] mins”* ([platform1_strength])
  - [video_url2]: *“[procedure1] Demo”* (e.g., [tool1] insertion)
- **Books:**
  - [resource1] (*[source1]*, Ch. [number]): *“[subdomain] made simple”*
  - [resource2] (*[source2]*): *“Compare [term1] vs. [term2]”*
- **Tools:**
  - [online_tool1]: *“Practice [skill1] with [simulation_tool1]”*
  - [app_name]: *“Flashcards for [body_system]”*

**10. Self-Quiz:**
1. *“Describe [pathophysiology1] in [body_system].”* → **[answer3]**
2. *“What’s the antidote for [drug_name2] overdose?”* → **[answer4]**
3. *“List 3 signs of [complication1].”* → **[answer5]**

**11. Clinical Pearls:**
- *“If [finding1], always check [lab_value1] before giving [drug_name1].”*
- *“[symptom3] + [symptom5] = [diagnosis2] until proven otherwise.”*
- *“Teach patients: ‘Call if [symptom6] after [procedure1].’”*

**12. Teacher’s Notes:**
- **For [term1]:**
  - *“Draw [visual_element1] on board; have students trace [mechanism_of_action].”*
  - *“Debate: ‘Is [drug_name1] or [drug_name2] better for [condition1]?’”*
- **For [procedure1]:**
  - *“Demo with [tool1]. Let students practice [step1] on [simulation_tool1].”*

**13. Printable Summary Sheet:**
```markdown
# [lesson_topic] Cheat Sheet

**💊 [drug_class] Drugs:**
- [drug_name1]: [drug_action1] | **SEs:** [adverse_effect1]
- [drug_name2]: [drug_action2] | **Contra:** [condition2]

**🩺 [condition1] Patho:**
[symptom1] → [finding1] → [diagnosis1] → **Tx:** [intervention1]

**⚠️ Red Flags:**
- [symptom3] + [symptom5] = [diagnosis2]
- [lab_value1] > [value3] = **Hold [drug_name1]!**

**📚 Resources:** [resource1], [video_url1]
```
template.pl:
**Temat:** [lesson_topic] (np. zaburzenia *[body_system]*)
**Kurs:** [degree_name] rok [number] (np. BSN rok 2)
**Focus:** [subdomain] (np. [drug_class] + [pathophysiology1])

**1. Przegląd kluczowych pojęć:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Pojęcia" />
| Pojęcie             | Definicja                                                                 | Znaczenie kliniczne                                      |
|----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------|
| [term1]              | [definition1] (np. *„[drug_class], który [drug_action1]”*)               | *„Stosowany przy [condition1]; monitoruj [adverse_effect1]”* |
| [term2]              | [definition2] (np. *„[pathophysiology1] → [symptom1]”*)                  | *„Oceniaj [vital_sign] co [timeframe]h pod kątem [complication1]”* |

**2. Dogłębna analiza patofizjologii:**
- **[condition1]:**
  - **Mechanizm:**
    1. [step1] (np. *„[cell_type1] uwalnia [chemical1]”*)
    2. [step2] → *„[organ1] reaguje [response1]”*
  - **Objawy:**
    - **Wczesne:** [symptom1], [symptom2]
    - **Późne:** [symptom3] (np. *„[finding1] w [diagnostic_tool1]”*)
  - **Powikłania:** [complication1] (np. *„[pathophysiology2] → [organ_failure1]”*)

**3. Farmakologia:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Leki" />
| Lek                | Klasa              | Mechanizm działania                          | Uwagi pielęgniarskie                          |
|--------------------|--------------------|-----------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| [drug_name1]       | [drug_class]        | *„[drug_action1]”*                           | *„Monitoruj: [lab_value1], [vital_sign].
   **Działania niepożądane:** [adverse_effect1], [adverse_effect2]
   **Edukacja:** ‘Zgłoś natychmiast [symptom4].’”* |
| [drug_name2]       | [drug_class]        | *„[drug_action2]”*                           | *„Przeciwwskazany w [condition2].
   **Odtrutka:** [antidote1] przy przedawkowaniu.”* |

**4. Procedury i umiejętności:**
- **[procedure1]:**
  - **Kroki:**
    1. [step1] (np. *„Przygotuj: [tool1], [tool2], [PPE]”*)
    2. [step2] → *„[action1], wyjaśniając [patient_education1]”*
  - **Powikłania:**
    - [complication2]: *„Spowodowane przez [error1]; zapobiegaj [prevention1]”*
    - [complication3]: *„Objawy: [symptom5], [symptom6]”*

**5. Częste błędy i wyjaśnienia:**

<mui:table-metadata title="Błędy" />
| Błąd                           | Poprawka                                                                 |
|--------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Mylenie [term3] i [term4]      | *„[term3] = [definition3]; [term4] = [definition4]”*                     |
| Błędna interpretacja [lab_value2] | *„[value1]–[value2] = norma; >[value3] = [diagnosis2]”*                  |

**6. Praktyka studiów przypadków:**
- **Scenariusz:**
  *„[patient_name], [age_group], zgłasza [symptom1] i [symptom2]. PMH: [condition1], [allergy1]. [vital_sign]s: [value1]/[value2], [value3] uderzeń/min, [value4]°C.”*
- **Pytania:**
  1. *„Jakie jest priorytetowe [assessment1]?”* → **[answer1]** (np. *„Sprawdź [lab_value1] pod kątem [abnormality1]”*)
  2. *„Który lek podać: [drug_name1] czy [drug_name2]?”* → **[answer2]** (np. *„[drug_name1]—[drug_action1] przeciwdziała [pathophysiology1]”*)

**7. Pomoce wizualne:**
- **[visual_element1]:** *[diagram]* mechanizmu [mechanism_of_action] dla [drug_name1]
  - **Opis:** [body_part1], [body_part2], [chemical1]
- **[visual_element2]:** Schemat postępu [condition1]:
  ```
  [symptom1] → [finding1] → [diagnosis1] → [intervention1] → [outcome1]
  ```

**8. Sposoby na zapamiętanie:**
- **Dla [term1]:** *„[memory_aid1]”* (np. *„[A0_word1] brzmi jak [C1_word1]”*)
- **Dla [drug_class]:**
  ```
  *„[drug_name1] i [drug_name2] kończą się na ‘-[suffix1]’ 
  → Oba [drug_action1]!”*
  ```

**9. Zasoby do dalszej nauki:**
- **Filmy:**
  - [video_url1]: *„[lesson_topic] w [timeframe] min”* ([platform1_strength])
  - [video_url2]: *„Demo [procedure1]”* (np. wkłucie [tool1])
- **Książki:**
  - [resource1] (*[source1]*, rozdz. [number]): *„[subdomain] prostym językiem”*
  - [resource2] (*[source2]*): *„Porównanie [term1] vs. [term2]”*
- **Narzędzia:**
  - [online_tool1]: *„Poćwicz [skill1] z [simulation_tool1]”*
  - [app_name]: *„Fiszki dla [body_system]”*

**10. Quiz samosprawdzający:**
1. *„Opisz [pathophysiology1] w [body_system].”* → **[answer3]**
2. *„Jaka jest odtrutka na przedawkowanie [drug_name2]?”* → **[answer4]**
3. *„Wymień 3 objawy [complication1].”* → **[answer5]**

**11. Perły kliniczne:**
- *„Jeśli [finding1], zawsze sprawdź [lab_value1] przed podaniem [drug_name1].”*
- *„[symptom3] + [symptom5] = [diagnosis2], dopóki nie udowodnisz inaczej.”*
- *„Ucz pacjentów: ‘Zadzwoń, jeśli [symptom6] po [procedure1].’”*

**12. Notatki dla nauczyciela:**
- **Dla [term1]:**
  - *„Narysuj [visual_element1] na tablicy; niech uczniowie śledzą [mechanism_of_action].”*
  - *„Debata: ‘Który lepiej: [drug_name1] czy [drug_name2] na [condition1]?’”*
- **Dla [procedure1]:**
  - *„Zademonstruj z [tool1]. Pozwól uczniom poćwiczyć [step1] na [simulation_tool1].”*

**13. Arkusz podsumowujący do druku:**
```markdown
# Ściąga: [lesson_topic]

**💊 Leki [drug_class]:**
- [drug_name1]: [drug_action1] | **Działania niepożądane:** [adverse_effect1]
- [drug_name2]: [drug_action2] | **Przeciwwskazanie:** [condition2]

**🩺 Patofizjologia [condition1]:**
[symptom1] → [finding1] → [diagnosis1] → **Leczenie:** [intervention1]

**⚠️ Czerwone flagi:**
- [symptom3] + [symptom5] = [diagnosis2]
- [lab_value1] > [value3] = **Wstrzymaj [drug_name1]!**

**📚 Zasoby:** [resource1], [video_url1]
```
